attributes.review: Worst app ever someone from the app killed my cat and then tried to kill my family and then they put cockroaches in my house🤮🤢

So many glitches I don’t know where to begin. The developer needs to fix it so I get alerts whenever Trump lies. Right now, the app only alerts you once a day, so if he lies multiple times a day—as he does—you only get the alert the first time! What about all the others? I want to know when he’s lying so I can double talk the stinkin’liberals. Don’t buy it until developer fixes this. At that point, I’ll share the other issues, but without a fully functioning fibber feature, I’m out. Sorry, it’s a deal breaker for me.
attributes.title: I love this! NOT.

attributes.review:
Been a trump supporter since the start, but I can’t support this.  Took FOREVER to download and when it did it kept crashing!  Took over 5 minutes just to get onto the homepage.  

ALSO IF YOU LEAVE THIS RUNNING IN THE BACKGROUND IT WILL COMPLETELY DRAIN YOUR BATTERY AND OVERHEAT THE PHONE. 

Sadly gonna be deleting this app.  Definitely not worth downloading.
attributes.title: Disappointed.  Slowed phone down

attributes.review: I hate this app  it’s so annoying I wouldn’t recommend anybody to use this app

attributes.review: I downloaded the app three hours ago and it just installed. I was connected to WiFi and everything. Apparently it also gave me a virus 🦠, though I’m not surprised.
